text: Sophia Lillis (born February 13, 2001) is an American actress. She is known for playing the character of Beverly Marsh in the horror movies It (2017) and It: Chapter Two (2019). In 2020, she received more popularity for her main role as a teenager with telekinetic abilities in the Netflix drama series I Am Not Okay with This. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Brooklyn Category:American television actors
title: Sophia Lillis
